00030 /*
00031  * floppy_ttl_init
00032  *
00033  * Called at the beginning of the run to discover SIS3600 modules
00034  * and initialize them.
00035  */
00036 INT floppy_ttl_init()
00037 {
00038   int status = iopl( 3 );
00039 
00040   if (status < 0) {
00041     diag_print(0, "Unable to get permission to access I/O ports\n");
00042   }
00043 
00044   // turn off output
00045   outb(0x1d, 0x3f2);
00046 
00047   return SUCCESS;
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * floppy_ttl_start_block
00052  *
00053  */
00054 INT floppy_ttl_start_block()
00055 {
00056   // Produce a quick pulse on the output
00057   outb(0x0d, 0x3f2);
00058   outb(0x1d, 0x3f2);
00059 
00060   bool ready = false;
00061   DWORD start_waiting = ss_millitime();
00062   while(!ready && ss_millitime() < start_waiting + 1000) {
00063 //  while(!ready) {
00064     int input = inb(0x3f7);
00065     if((input & 0x80)) {
00066       ready = true;
00067     }
00068   }
00069 
00070   if(!ready) {
00071     printf("\n\n\nNot ready, start times out\n");
00072   }
00073 
00074   return SUCCESS;
00075 }
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * floppy_ttl_poll_live()
00079  *
00080  * Called periodically while a block is active; performs active readout.
00081  *
00082  * Returns:
00083  * - ordinarily 0,
00084  * - a request for a "soft stop" end-of-block, or
00085  * - an error code
00086  */
00087 INT floppy_ttl_poll_live()
00088 {
00089   int input = inb(0x3f7);
00090 
00091   // high bit of input: 1 = TTL LOW, 0 = TTL HIGH
00092   if(!(input & 0x80)) {
00093     return FE_END_BLOCK;
00094   } else {
00095     return SUCCESS;
00096   }
00097 }
00098 
00099 INT floppy_ttl_poll_dead()
00100 {
00101     return FE_NEED_START;
00102 }
